definition: Shenkeng township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Shenkeng township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

sentences.english: But too wide to cross from one side on the land.
sentences.chinese: 但站在其中一边的地面上看，那深坑阔得无法跨过去。

sentences.english: To bring back his soul from the pit, to be enlightened with the light of the living.
sentences.chinese: 为要从深坑救回人的灵魂，使他被光照耀与活人一样。

sentences.english: He jumped even harder and finally made it out.
sentences.chinese: 而那只蛙却跳得更带劲了，最后他成功地跳出了深坑。

sentences.english: Strong economic growth, for a decade or so, offers the only comfortable way out of the hole.
sentences.chinese: 十年左右的强势经济增长，是走出深坑的唯一坦途。

sentences.english: Have mercy on me, and lift me up out of the pit of depression.
sentences.chinese: 求你施恩怜悯我，将我从抑郁的深坑中拉上来。

sentences.english: A deep hole in the earth gaped before us .
sentences.chinese: 在我们面前的地上裂开着一个深坑。

sentences.english: Rhaegal roared in answer, and fire filled the pit, a spear of red and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 雷哥吼着呼应，火焰充斥了深坑，一根红黄的长矛。

sentences.english: Wuyi mountain escarpment, pit giant valley.
sentences.chinese: 武夷山绝壁峭壁，深坑巨谷。

sentences.english: A deep hole in the earth gaped before us.
sentences.chinese: 我们面前的地上裂开了一个深坑。

sentences.english: Fantastic Pit is located in Ellisons Cave, just east of La Fayette, GA.
sentences.chinese: 奇异的深坑位于埃里森洞穴，在拉斐特的东方。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
so deep one cannot see to the bottom/limitless
Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
